revised_title: Anniversary Address: Scientific Achievements and Honorary Awards of the Royal Society
tldr: In this address, Sir Cyril Hinshelwood highlights the significant scientific achievements and honorary awards presented by the Royal Society. The address covers various fields, including biology, chemistry, physics, geophysics, crystallography, earth sciences, astronomy, medicine, and biographies. The recipients of the awards are recognized for their outstanding contributions to their respective fields, such as P.M.S. Blackett, F.R.S., F.P. Bowden, F.R.S., Dorothy M.C. Hodgkin, F.R.S., O.T. Jones, F.R.S., and R.D. Haworth, F.R.S.
